name: The Balancing of Hill House
description:
Your late aunt Sally has bequeathed you her house which sits precariously atop a hill. Over the years, your aunt has achieved a very delicate equilibrium within the house with the placement of furniture, which she hoarded. Now that it's time for you to move *in*, it's time to move all of her old fusty things *out*.

Push items to the front door for movers to come pick up. They will carry the items away as fast as they can. The more items the estate sale company picks up, the more money you make. They're on a strict schedule so move quickly, but be careful not to let one side of the house get too heavy!

Controls:

Up, Down, Left, Right Arrows for movement.

Play Game:

Download .zip, extract, find the LudumDare49.exe to launch the game
